remarks: Define the (strong) ultrafilter lemma, parameterized over base sets.  A set ` X ` satisfies the ultrafilter lemma if every filter on ` X ` is a subset of some ultrafilter.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
statement:
isufl $p |- ( X e. V -> ( X e. UFL <-> A. f e. ( Fil ` X ) E. g e. ( UFil ` X ) f C_ g ) ) $.
$d X f g $.
